729747f-a.text:
Todt Hill Road, east side, between Richmond Road and Flagg Place. Beer's 1874 map indicates the house to have belonged to Mrs. J. Fountain. Maps from 1898 to 1917 show it to have been within the bounds of the Moravian Cemetery.

April 22, 1932
P.L. Sperr
729747f-a.original_title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Richmond Road
729747f-a.folder: Todt Hill Road & Richmond Road, Staten Island, NY
